page.title: 13SENIOR CITIZENS IN 1985
page.content: Likes and dislikes Senior Citizen A likes (1)End of the miners' strike (2)Burton's second bridge (3)Greater effort to counteract drugs abuse (4)Advances in surgery for heart and kidney sufferers (5)Better tax relief for the elderly (6)Glad to be alive to see both sides of the project. Senior Citizen A dislikes (1)High cost of living (2)Present economic situation (3)Violence and crime (4)Antagonism between U.S.A. and Russia (5)State of the National Health Service (6)Huge profits made by nationalised industries Senior Citizen B likes (1)Gardening (2)Reading (3)Decorating (4)Television (5)Photography (6)Bird Watching Senior Citizen B dislikes (1)Radio (2)Pop music (3)Vandalism robbing and mugging (4)Arms Race (5)Unemployment (6)Poor Public Transport Service.
